name: When Pigs Fly Go
description:
Penelope Pig always wanted to fly.
Everyone told her not to even try.

She never gave up and built a pair of wings.
Oh yes! Oh yes! What beautiful things!

Touch and hold to make Penelope
run when going down the hillside.

Let go while moving uphill to try to fly.
If you do it just right you will go really high!

Watch out for alligators and grab yummy gumdrops!
Double tap the screen and Penelope hops.

Hint: You can touch the screen while
flying to make Penelope fly down sooner.
